requirements.title: E-Copy of completed Research Proposal (PDF FILE)
requirements.description: Final PDF version of the completed research proposal. Example: HM 1 Final.pdf

requirements.title: E-Copy of completed Research Proposal (WORD FILE)
requirements.description: Final Word document version of the completed research proposal. Example: HM 1 Final.docx

requirements.title: Turnitin Digital Receipt (PDF file)
requirements.description: Digital receipt from Turnitin submission. Example: HM 1 Digital Receipt.pdf

requirements.title: Turnitin Similarity Check Result (PDF file)
requirements.description: Similarity check result from Turnitin. Example: HM 1 Similarity Check Result.pdf

requirements.title: SIGNED Student Requirements Grading Sheet (PDF file)
requirements.description: Signed grading sheet based on the program requirements. Example: HM 1 Signed Advisers Criteria for Grading.pdf

requirements.title: SIGNED Pre-Proposal Defense Approval Sheet (PDF file)
requirements.description: Signed approval sheet for pre-proposal defense. Example: HM 1 Signed PD Approval Sheet.pdf

requirements.title: Proof of Adviser and Editor's Approval (PDF file)
requirements.description: Compile in one file only of screenshot conversations showing adviser and editor approval. Example: HM 1 Proof of Adviser and Editor.pdf

requirements.title: SIGNED Mock Defense Form (PDF file)
requirements.description: Signed mock defense form. Example: HM 1 Signed Mock Defense Form.PDF

requirements.title: Proof of Payment for Proposal Defense (JPEG)
requirements.description: Payment receipt for proposal defense. Example: HM 1 Proof of Payment.jpeg

requirements.title: Letter of Extension
requirements.description: If applicable, hard copy of extension letter. Example: Letter of Extension

requirements.title: E-Copy of completed Research Proposal PDF FILE (FINAL)
requirements.description: Final PDF version of the completed research proposal after defense. Example: HM 1 Final.pdf

requirements.description: Final Word document version of the completed research proposal after defense. Example: HM 1 Final.docx

requirements.description: Signed approval sheet for post-proposal defense. Example: HM 1 Signed Post PD Approval Sheet.pdf

requirements.title: Proof of Adviser, Editor and 3 Panelists' Approval (PDF file)
requirements.description: Screenshots of conversations compiled in one file showing approval from adviser, editor, and 3 panelists. Example: HM 1 Proof of Adviser, Editor, and 3 Panelists.pdf

requirements.title: Proof of accomplished evaluation forms for Proposal Defense (PDF file)
requirements.description: Compile in one file only. Example: Proof of evaluations for PD.pdf

requirements.description: Signed comment sheet from Panel 1. Example: HM 1 Comment Sheet Panel 1.pdf

requirements.description: Signed comment sheet from Panel 2. Example: HM 1 Comment Sheet Panel 2.pdf

requirements.description: Signed comment sheet from Panel 3. Example: HM 1 Comment Sheet Panel 3.pdf

requirements.description: Compiled summary of all panelists' comment sheets. Example: HM1 Compilation of Panelists' Comment Sheets

requirements.title: SIGNED Adviser's Consultation Form
requirements.description: Signed consultation form from adviser. Example: HM 1 Adviser's Consultation Form.pdf

requirements.title: Evaluation for the Continuous Improvement for Student Research Program
requirements.description: All members per group who undergo change of grade (if applicable) - screenshot. Example: HM 1_SRP Continuous Improvement
